text: English mini lesson number five the

the father's listening task 5 now watch

income Americans celebrate Mother's Day

well most Americans simply address their

yet in some families you may hear mama

now traditionally it's the mother who
stays home with the children and the

if this is the case we call the mother a

the case especially today when two

call her a working mother
now motherhood certainly isn't easy and
some moms face an additional challenge
because they're raising their children
on their own without the support of a
father
we call these moms single moms in short
there are all kinds of mothers single
moms working moms stay-at-home moms all
of them deserve to be celebrated and
that's why we have the holiday of
Mother's Day
thanks for watching happy studies to you
all and to all the mothers watching
